name: Bridge Pals
description:
Game made in  a bus trip of 6 hours (and a couple more later at home) using only: a laptop with GameMaker Studio 2(code), a phone with Instagram (for graphics and sprites), a good ol' notebook and Telegram for file management and sound recording.

Also used Figma for cropping and stretching the Instagram screenshot, could do that with GameMaker... but with Figma is easier.

The theme of our "bus gamejam" was Bridge, choosed randomly between all the themes in archive of https://onehourgamejam.com/
Bridge Pals is ment to be played by two players and you must connect the bridge your trying to build.
